Class PlayerImage

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.Actor
PlayerImage
public class PlayerImage extends greenfoot.Actor
Handles the visual representation and animation of the player, separate from gameplay logic. Responsibilities: Display correct facing direction, Play chopping animations, Follow PlayerController
